meanings.definition: A person who participates in or supports jihad.
meanings.sent1: The jihadists in the news were fighting for their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The community was concerned about the presence of jihadists in the area.
meanings.sent3: The jihadists decided to have a bake sale to raise funds for their cause.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like that of the jihadists on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The image of the jihadists marching in unison left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.definition: Members of a militant Islamic group that advocates for jihad.
meanings.sent1: The jihadists gathered to plan their next attack.
meanings.sent2: Authorities were monitoring the movements of known jihadists.
meanings.sent3: The jihadists tried to recruit new members at the local market.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the jihadists spread like wildfire through the region.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the jihadists instilled fear in the local population.
